com.mapquest.android.intent
Class MapQuestAppLauncher

java.lang.Object
  com.mapquest.android.intent.MapQuestAppLauncher

public class MapQuestAppLauncher
extends java.lang.Object

A helper class that will create and start Intents for directly launching the MapQuest App.

Method Detail

launchNavigation

public static void launchNavigation(android.content.Context context,
                                    GeoPoint pt,
                                    java.lang.String label)
This method will launch the MapQuest Navigation app if it is installed and automatically begin navigating from your current location to the GeoPoint passed in. If the MapQuest application is not already installed on the device, it will prompt the user to download it from the market.

Parameters:
context - The Activity context.
pt - The GeoPoint to navigate to.
label - A label for the point navigating to.

launchNavigation

public static void launchNavigation(android.content.Context context,
                                    GeoPoint pt,
                                    java.lang.String label,
                                    MapQuestAppLauncher.MapType mapType,
                                    MapQuestAppLauncher.MapLayer layer)
This method will launch the MapQuest Navigation app if it is installed and automatically begin navigating from your current location to the GeoPoint passed in. If the MapQuest application is not already installed on the device, it will prompt the user to download it from the market.

Parameters:
context - The Activity context.
pt - The GeoPoint to navigate to.
label - A label for the point navigating to.
mapType - The map type to use for navigation (MAP, HYB, SAT).
layer - The map layer to overlay on the map (TRAFFIC).
